registration.question: How quickly can I get my domain after registration?
registration.answer: Domain registration is instant for most extensions. Once payment is processed, your domain is immediately active and ready to use. DNS propagation typically takes 24-48 hours globally.

dns.question: Do you provide DNS management and email forwarding?
dns.answer: Yes, all domain registrations include free DNS management through our intuitive control panel. Email forwarding is included with most plans, and we offer professional email hosting as an add-on.

expiration.question: What happens when my domain expires?
expiration.answer: We send renewal reminders 90, 30, and 7 days before expiration. Domains can be renewed up to 30 days after expiration. After that, there's a grace period before the domain becomes available to others.

transfer.question: Can I transfer my existing domain to you?
transfer.answer: Absolutely! Domain transfers are free and typically complete within 5-7 days. We'll handle the technical details and ensure no downtime during the transfer process.

privacy.question: Do you offer domain privacy protection?
privacy.answer: Yes, WHOIS privacy protection is included free with all domain registrations. This keeps your personal information private and reduces spam and unwanted contact.
